items.content_html: observerly's lightweight, zero-dependency, type safe astrometry library written in TypeScript. This library can be used to ascertain to positions of the Sun, Moon and the planets, as well as ascertain transit times for any astronomical object.
items.title: observerly/astrometry: observerly's lightweight, zero-dependency, type safe astrometry library written in TypeScript. This library can be used to ascertain to positions of the Sun, Moon and the planets, as well as ascertain transit times for any astronomical object.

items.content_html: The xxAPI repository is a lightweight JavaScript library designed to simplify common DOM manipulation tasks, handle AJAX requests, manage cookies and local storage, and provide utilities for smooth scrolling, function throttling, script loading, URL manipulation, and random data generation.
items.title: N3M1K/xxapi:  The xxAPI repository is a lightweight JavaScript library designed to simplify common DOM manipulation tasks, handle AJAX requests, manage cookies and local storage, and provide utilities for smooth scrolling, function throttling, script loading, URL manipulation, and random data generation.

items.content_html: Grand Code Environment (GCE): A fast, flexible, portable, and cross-platform code environment for building and customizing powerful code editors.
items.title: pass-me-dachips/gce: Grand Code Environment (GCE): A fast, flexible, portable, and cross-platform code environment for building and customizing powerful code editors.

items.content_html: LodScrolJS Documentation LodScrolJS is a lightweight, fast, and secure JavaScript library designed to load any type of content from APIs on scroll, helping to avoid loading too much data at once. It works seamlessly with various JavaScript frameworks
items.title: Ismail-Mouyahada/lodscroljs-library: LodScrolJS Documentation LodScrolJS is a lightweight, fast, and secure JavaScript library designed to load any type of content from APIs on scroll, helping to avoid loading too much data at once. It works seamlessly with various JavaScript frameworks

items.content_html: This project is a lightweight web-based music player implemented using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It features basic functionality such as play/pause, next song, and volume control.
items.title: sumitti/Music_Player:  This project is a lightweight web-based music player implemented using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It features basic functionality such as play/pause, next song, and volume control.

items.content_html: Explore Kubernetes features with ease using kube-demo. This repository contains all necessary Kubernetes resources for deploying and managing a lightweight application within a Kubernetes cluster. Ideal for hands-on demonstrations and learning Kubernetes orchestration.
items.title: cbabey/kubernetes-demo: Explore Kubernetes features with ease using kube-demo. This repository contains all necessary Kubernetes resources for deploying and managing a lightweight application within a Kubernetes cluster. Ideal for hands-on demonstrations and learning Kubernetes orchestration.
